parameters.toolDescription: This bot help you to scrap all contact information for lead gen from google map. Input query "q" for search input, "ll" for latlng, "page" is for the current page. For "ll", please follow coordinates in this format: @latitude,longitude,zoom, for example: @40.6973709,-74.1444871,11z.
This bot help you to search it from internet result perplexity, pass "question" as parameter for the searching question.
This is a web crawler, you can input URL for scrapping the website content.

This bot will search videos from Youtube with following parameter:

q: Query
gl: Country
location: Location
hl: Language
tbs: Date range
num: Results

parameters.name: Post_Threads_Tool
parameters.description:
This tool posts content directly to Threads, supporting single posts and multi-post threads with proper formatting for engaging delivery.

When to Use:

Single Post: For concise text within Threads' 400-character limit.
Multi-Post Thread: For content exceeding the limit, split into cohesive posts with clear structure.
Input Requirements:

Single Post: A plain text string.
Multi-Post Thread: Start with (THREAD ğŸ§µ) 1/{total}. Number each post and separate them with ----Thread----. Ensure continuity and value in content.
Example Inputs:
Single Post:
Renewable energy is transforming small businesses, cutting costs, and boosting sustainability. #RenewableEnergy

Multi-Post Thread:
(THREAD ğŸ§µ) 1/3 Renewable energy is revolutionizing businesses.----Thread---- ğŸ§µ 2/3 High costs slow adoption, but incentives help.----Thread----ğŸ§µ 3/3Potential is massive. Whatâ€™s your take?

Features:

Single post and multi-thread support.
Validates format, posts in sequence, and confirms success/errors.

parameters.toolDescription:
This tool enables direct posting to Facebook, ensuring input is formatted for a single post to the company page via API.

Usage Instructions:
Call this tool to publish a Facebook post. Input should be a pre-written text string that adheres to Facebook 3000-character limit and stylistic norms.

Input Requirements:

Professional tone and well-structured content.
Include 2â€“3 relevant hashtags.
Optionally embed URLs or call-to-action elements.

parameters.jsCode:
const threadText = $("Seta a variavel thread_text").first().json.thread_text.split("----Thread----").map((word) => word.trim());

return { threadText };
